channel.title: CVE Feed for Rocket Software -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rocket Software -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-28502|2024-08-02T13:43:22.500Z -- rocket%20software -- unidata
item.description: Rocket Software UniData versions prior to 8.2.4 build 3003 and UniVerse versions prior to 11.3.5 build 1001 or 12.2.1 build 2002 suffer from a stack-based buffer overflow in the "udadmin" service that can lead to remote code execution as the root user.

item.title: CVE-2023-28501|2024-08-02T12:38:25.404Z -- rocket%20software -- unidata
item.description: Rocket Software UniData versions prior to 8.2.4 build 3003 and UniVerse versions prior to 11.3.5 build 1001 or 12.2.1 build 2002 suffer from a heap-based buffer overflow in the unirpcd daemon that, if successfully exploited, can lead to remote code execution as the root user.

item.title: CVE-2023-28503|2024-08-02T13:43:22.599Z -- rocket%20software -- unidata
item.description: Rocket Software UniData versions prior to 8.2.4 build 3003 and UniVerse versions prior to 11.3.5 build 1001 or 12.2.1 build 2002 suffer from an authentication bypass vulnerability, where a special username with a deterministic password can be leveraged to bypass authentication checks and execute OS commands as the root user.

item.title: CVE-2023-28506|2024-08-02T13:43:22.423Z -- rocket%20software -- unidata
item.description: Rocket Software UniData versions prior to 8.2.4 build 3003 and UniVerse versions prior to 11.3.5 build 1001 or 12.2.1 build 2002 suffer from a stack-based buffer overflow, where a string is copied into a buffer using a memcpy-like function and a user-provided length. This requires a valid login to exploit.

item.title: CVE-2023-28509|2024-08-02T13:43:22.434Z -- rocket%20software -- unidata
item.description: Rocket Software UniData versions prior to 8.2.4 build 3003 and UniVerse versions prior to 11.3.5 build 1001 or 12.2.1 build 2002 use weak encryption for packet-level security and passwords transferred on the wire.

item.title: CVE-2023-28508|2024-08-02T13:43:22.463Z -- rocket%20software -- unidata
item.description: Rocket Software UniData versions prior to 8.2.4 build 3003 and UniVerse versions prior to 11.3.5 build 1001 or 12.2.1 build 2002 suffer from a heap-based overflow vulnerability, where certain input can corrupt the heap and crash the forked process.

item.title: CVE-2023-28504|2024-08-02T13:43:22.470Z -- rocket%20software -- unidata
item.description: Rocket Software UniData versions prior to 8.2.4 build 3003 and UniVerse versions prior to 11.3.5 build 1001 or 12.2.1 build 2002 suffer from a stack-based buffer overflow that can lead to remote code execution as the root user.

item.title: CVE-2023-28505|2024-08-02T13:43:22.519Z -- rocket%20software -- unidata
item.description: Rocket Software UniData versions prior to 8.2.4 build 3003 and UniVerse versions prior to 11.3.5 build 1001 or 12.2.1 build 2002 suffer from a buffer overflow in an API function, where a string is copied into a caller-provided buffer without checking the length. This requires a valid login to exploit.

item.title: CVE-2023-28507|2024-08-02T13:43:22.295Z -- rocket%20software -- unidata
item.description: Rocket Software UniData versions prior to 8.2.4 build 3003 and UniVerse versions prior to 11.3.5 build 1001 or 12.2.1 build 2002 suffer from a memory-exhaustion issue, where a decompression routine will allocate increasing amounts of memory until all system memory is exhausted and the forked process crashes.
